cause.description:
Donations to this cause don't count towards the contest. Donate here instead: http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/51495
1. Every child deserves access to opportunities and experiences.
2. Building bridges between communities is a powerful force for social change.
3. Energy and optimism are contagious.
cause.mission: Make all donations to DREAM's other cause until the end of January!
cause.name: DREAM
